sentences.en: As soon as the cake is done, remove it from the oven.
sentences.cn: 蛋糕一烤好就从炉子里取出来。

sentences.en: Brush the glaze over the top and sides of the hot cake.
sentences.cn: 在热蛋糕的顶上和周围刷上一层蛋浆。

sentences.en: Getting rid of him will be a piece of cake.
sentences.cn: 摆脱掉他就是小事一桩。

sentences.en: I never said that training him would be a piece of cake.
sentences.cn: 我从未说过对他进行训练会是小菜一碟。

sentences.en: I would like my wedding cake decorated with cupids.
sentences.cn: 我想在我的结婚蛋糕上装饰一些丘比特的造型。

sentences.en: Mr. Long was now cutting himself a piece of the pink cake.
sentences.cn: 朗先生正在给自己切一块粉色蛋糕。

sentences.en: Pour the mixture into the cake tin and bake for 45 minutes.
sentences.cn: 把混合物倒进烤模烤制45分钟。

sentences.en: Serve the cake warm or at room temperature, cut in squares.
sentences.cn: 等蛋糕温热或凉至室温时切成四方块端上桌。

sentences.en: She spread the icing over the cake, dabbing it with a knife.
sentences.cn: 她把糖霜浇在蛋糕上面，并用刀子轻轻涂抹开。

sentences.en: Spread the mixture in the cake tin and bake for 30 minutes.
sentences.cn: 将混合物抹在蛋糕烤盘里，烘烤30分钟。

sentences.en: The blood had begun to cake and turn brown.
The third goal was the icing on the cake.
sentences.cn: 第三粒进球是锦上添花。

sentences.en: They joked and drank coffee and filled themselves with chocolate cake.
sentences.cn: 他们开着玩笑，喝着咖啡，尽情地吃着巧克力蛋糕。

sentences.en: Turn the cake the right way up on to a wire rack.
sentences.cn: 把蛋糕翻到合适的方向对准金属丝架上。

sentences.en: We had cake and ice cream.
sentences.cn: 我们吃了蛋糕和冰激凌。

sentences.en: Would you like some chocolate cake?
sentences.cn: 来点巧克力蛋糕怎么样？

phrases.tran_cn: n. 干酪饼；富于性感的半裸体美女照
轻而易举的事情；轻松愉快的事
(非正式)销路很好；卖得快又多

phrases.phrase: you can't have your cake and eat it (too)

trans.tran_en: a soft sweet food made by baking a mixture of flour, butter, sugar, and eggs
a soft sweet food made by baking a mixture of flour, butter, sugar, and eggs
if a substance cakes, it forms a thick hard layer when it dries
